      int getDeaths(java.lang.String player)
      Does the same thing as SQLUtils.getDeaths(java.util.UUID, boolean), but reads from a local file instead of a MySQL database.

    • Method Detail

      • getKills

        public int getKills(java.lang.String player)
        Does the same thing as SQLUtils.getKills(java.util.UUID, boolean), but reads from a local file instead of a MySQL database.
        Parameters:
        player - the UUID of the player
        Returns:
        the amount of kills a player has in PvZ

      • getRowsCaptured

        public int getRowsCaptured(java.lang.String player)
        Does the same thing as SQLUtils.getRowsCaptured(java.util.UUID, boolean), but reads from a local file instead of a MySQL database.
        Parameters:
        player - the UUID of the player
        Returns:
        the amount of rows a player has captured in PvZ

      • getDeaths

        public int getDeaths(java.lang.String player)
        Does the same thing as SQLUtils.getDeaths(java.util.UUID, boolean), but reads from a local file instead of a MySQL database.
        Parameters:
        player - the UUID of the player
        Returns:
        the amount of times a player has died in PvZ

      • getGamesPlayed

        public int getGamesPlayed(java.lang.String player)

        Parameters:
        player - the UUID of the player
        Returns:
        the amount of times a player has played PvZ
